title: Metis & LazAI Launch GMPayer: The Cross-Chain Payment Hub for AI Agents
content:
AI is entering a new era, one where intelligent agents don’t just process data, they transact value.
To make that possible, LazAI, in collaboration with Metis, ZKM, and GOAT Network, has launched GMPayer , an x402-powered, cross-chain payment hub that allows AI agents to make instant, verifiable, and trustless payments across multiple blockchains without intermediaries.
What is GMPayer?
GMPayer (GOAT–Metis–Payer) is the first multi-currency, x402-based payment protocol designed specifically for the AI agent economy.
It brings together:
LazAI – Through the Data Anchoring Token (DAT) standard, LazAI connects data ownership, rights, and revenue to every AI transaction. Contributors are automatically compensated when their data or models are used.
Metis – Provides the execution and settlement backbone, with Andromeda anchoring transactions and Hyperion scaling microtransactions for AI workflows.
ZKM – Validates every transaction through zero-knowledge proofs, ensuring payments remain transparent, neutral, and verifiable.
GOAT Network – Bridges Bitcoin and stablecoin liquidity with zkRollup infrastructure and EIP-3009 compatibility for x402-based payments.
Together, these networks form a decentralized payment layer where AI agents can buy, sell, and exchange data and services autonomously.
Why x402 Changes Everything
For over three decades, the web reserved HTTP 402: “Payment Required”, a dormant status code.
In 2025, Coinbase and Cloudflare revived it as x402, creating a new standard for per-request, onchain payments.
x402 lets one AI agent pay another directly in the same request — no accounts, no APIs, no invoices.
But to make it safe, every payment must be provable, rights-bound, and multi-chain compatible.
That’s the role of GMPayer: to turn x402 from a protocol into a working economic layer where agents can transact securely, instantly, and autonomously.
GMPayer’s Four-Phase Vision
Phase 1 – Build the Payment Hub
Launch the first x402-based, cross-chain hub where AI agents independently pay for compute, data, and model access.
Phase 2 – Make Payments Trustworthy and Controllable
Introduce user-level controls for agent micropayments, including safe budgets, spending limits, and transparent transaction histories.
Phase 3 – Create the AI Business Network
Transform AI services into profit-generating assets through DAT attribution, enabling per-call rewards.
Phase 4 – Build a Universal AI Value-Exchange Layer
Seamlessly integrate AI commerce across all Web3 chains, a global marketplace for data, compute, and intelligence.
Why It Matters for Metis
For Metis, this marks a major leap forward in scaling Hyperion’s high-throughput infrastructure and Andromeda’s decentralized settlement.
By enabling AI payments directly on Metis Andromeda, GMPayer cements Metis as the economic and technical backbone of the AI-powered Web3 economy, a system where data, computation, and payments converge into a single, verifiable loop.
The AI Agent Economy Starts Here
With GMPayer, AI agents stop just “thinking”, they start transacting.
Every API call becomes a deal.
Every dataset becomes an asset.
Every contribution earns value automatically.
This is how LazAI, Metis, ZKM, and GOAT Network are building the foundation of an AI economy that runs itself — autonomous, decentralized, and borderless.
Learn more: Read the GMPayer User Guide →
X402 and LazAI: Powering Payments for the Agent Economy
Read more : How LazAI is Building the Value Layer for AI Commerce

Introduce user-level controls for agent micropayments, including safe budgets, spending limits, and transparent transaction histories.
Phase 3 – Create the AI Business Network
Transform AI services into profit-generating assets through DAT attribution, enabling per-call rewards.
Phase 4 – Build a Universal AI Value-Exchange Layer
Seamlessly integrate AI commerce across all Web3 chains, a global marketplace for data, compute, and intelligence.
Why It Matters for Metis
For Metis, this marks a major leap forward in scaling Hyperion’s high-throughput infrastructure and Andromeda’s decentralized settlement.
By enabling AI payments directly on Metis Andromeda, GMPayer cements Metis as the economic and technical backbone of the AI-powered Web3 economy, a system where data, computation, and payments converge into a single, verifiable loop.
The AI Agent Economy Starts Here
With GMPayer, AI agents stop just “thinking”, they start transacting.
Every API call becomes a deal.
Every dataset becomes an asset.
Every contribution earns value automatically.
This is how LazAI, Metis, ZKM, and GOAT Network are building the foundation of an AI economy that runs itself — autonomous, decentralized, and borderless.
Learn more: Read the GMPayer User Guide →
X402 and LazAI: Powering Payments for the Agent Economy
Read more : How LazAI is Building the Value Layer for AI Commerce

title: Multi-Agent Orchestration in LazAI : Why it Matters
content:
Hii Laz fam :)))
Here we go with my first post from the LazAI journey! Let’s pull back the curtain on what really makes things tick with the Multi-Agent Orchestrator. #lazAiNetwork
Picture this: a wild AI concert where all the top agents take the stage together . You’ve got the finance brainiac, the logistics mastermind , the compliance expert , , everyone’s got their thing . but without a conductor??
Total chaos. That’s when the Multi-Agent Orchestrator steps in and brings order to the madness.
The Orchestrator is like the conductor who keeps these AI superstars in sync . it gets them sharing info , splitting up jobs , learning from each other , and building out workflows that actually scale . There;s no room for lone wolves here ., its all about the band
inside LAZAI , this maestro works with:
Alith agents (these are your specialist Als )
Digital Twins (think real-world AI replicas)
DAT anchored workflows (secure , decentralised data flows)
…>>>This is the secret ingredient that turns clever code into something that actually makes a difference.
so why does this matter? Simple: instead of running one AI ragged , the orchestrator directs a whole team of specialists. That makes everything: (smarter, faster, way more dependable). Each agent knows where it fits , so they play together without stepping on each other’s toes.
Here’s what really gets me : the whole thing just scales. You need more muscle? Add new agents , no sweat. Something goes sideways? The orchestrator reroutes tasks and keeps things rolling ; nothing falls apart. It’s AI teamwork at its best , like multiplayer chess but with bots pulling off insane moves.
whether you’re tracking data, running simulations , or launching AI-powered apps, the Multi-Agent Orchestrator is your all access pass to decentralizeed , intelligent teamwork. This is the future, and it’s already jamming.
Want in?? FOLLOW @LazAI@LazAINetwork for more lazai stories and tech explained with a twist . jump in and ride the AI wave .
#AIOrchestration #DigitalTwins #FutureOfAI
:)) lets stay connected :))
